description.full: By performing in a series of simple, yet highly entertaining mini-games and improvisations, “You’re In The Movies” & an Xbox LIVE Vision camera transport you & your friends out of your living room and into being the stars of your very own movie trailer!  With over 30 trailers of various popular “B Movie” genres to star in, “You’re In The Movies” is a great addition to any social gathering. Share your cinematic creations by downloading your masterpieces to your computer and sharing them with friends, family and the entire world online.
